titles.title: A resolution designating the week of May 15 through May 21, 2011, as "National Public Works Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
5/16/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the week of May 15-May 21, 2011, as National Public Works Week.
Recognizes the important contributions of public works professionals to improving U.S. public infrastructure and to the communities they serve.
